arts.ttl: Palace mourn loss of beloved supporter Pam Blomfield
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are deeply saddened to learn of the passing of beloved supporter 'Nan Pam' Blomfield.

Marco Silva admitted Fulham were well below par in their 2-0 defeat at home to Crystal Palace. The Whites failed to muster an effort on target and have now won just one of their past seven matches at Craven Cottage. “It definitely was a performance below the standards, if I can say in this way,” […] The post Silva admits Fulham were poor appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Glasner: "We know we can be tough to play against"
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner praised his Crystal Palace team for a "disciplined" defensive display after a fourth away victory on the spin for the Eagles, with a 2-0 win against Fulham.
Oliver Glasner praises his side's discipline after Crystal Palace won their fourth consecutive Premier League away game 2-0 at Fulham.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner hails ‘tough to play against’ Crystal Palace after win at Fulham
arts.sum: The Eagles made it four wins in six and were helped by former player Joachim Andersen, who scored an own goal in the 37th-minute.

arts.ttl: Fulham didn't reach their own standards - Silva
arts.sum: Fulham boss Marco Silva says his side deserved nothing from their 2-0 defeat by Crystal Palace in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Leeds plotting summer move for 30-G/A Newcastle and Crystal Palace target
arts.sum: Leeds United are keen on securing the services of the Celtic attacker Nicolas Kuhn. They will face competition from Premier League clubs Crystal Palace and Everton as well. The former Germany youth international has been outstanding for the Scottish club and the likes of Newcastle and Brentford are keeping tabs on him as well as […] The post Leeds plotting summer move for 30-G/A Newcastle and Crystal Palace target appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Fulham 0-2 Crystal Palace: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Joachim Andersen endures nightmare against former club
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Fulham and Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Daniel Munoz and a Joachim Andersen own goal see Crystal Palace past Fulham
arts.sum: Victory for Oliver Glasner’s men made it four league wins in their last six matches and they remain 13th as a result.

arts.ttl: Gallery: The best photos from Fulham v Palace
arts.sum: Crystal Palace return to action on Saturday afternoon (15:00 GMT) for a Premier League trip across the capital to face Fulham. Check out the best images from the day in our gallery below...
